text:
Jimmy Butler III (born September 14, 1989) is an American professional basketball player who got drafted 30th overall in 2011 to the Chicago Bulls. He now is currently plays for the Miami Heat of the NBA.
Butler was born on September 14, 1989 in Houston, Texas. He studied at Tomball High School. Then went to Tyler Junior College (2007-2008), after that he went to Marquette University (2008-2011). Jimmy Butler is among few NBA players to play 4 years in college.
